channel.title: Is it me, or my friend?
channel.description: Okay, I was finishing up my Moparscape server and I finished portfowarding, and i went to my other computer, tried it, and it worked, even on all of my computers it worked! but then my friend tried to log on but he couldnt, it said "Error connecting to server" Why is this? :confused: :confused: :eek:

item.title: Is it me, or my friend?
item.dc:creator: @Zone88 Zone88
item.description:
@Zone88 wrote:

Yeah, i Agree with everyone else, you probably didnt Portforward right. But keep trying you will get it sometime.

Read full topic
item.source: Is it me, or my friend?

item.title: Is it me, or my friend?
item.dc:creator: @Soul-Scape Soul-Scape
item.description:
@Soul-Scape wrote:

ya you need to portforward

here
http://www.portforward.com/

or here
http://temp2.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,342685.0.html

Read full topic
item.source: Is it me, or my friend?

item.title: Is it me, or my friend?
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

They all use the localhost default IP: 127.0.0.1.

Read full topic
item.source: Is it me, or my friend?

item.title: Is it me, or my friend?
item.dc:creator: @bbl111 bbl111
item.description:
@bbl111 wrote:

Well, even if they all did use the same router, wouldn’t they all have different ip addresses?

Read full topic
item.source: Is it me, or my friend?

item.title: Is it me, or my friend?
item.dc:creator: @the1337legend the1337legend
item.description:
@the1337legend wrote:

you didnt portforward correct, all ur cps r using the same router i take it, portforwarding allows other “connections” not computers to log in.

Read full topic
item.source: Is it me, or my friend?
